title: Avocado 'cannelloni' with crab, scallops and sea herbs
description: Avocado and seafood combine to create a light refreshing take on cannelloni.
ingredients: 1 cooked cock crab, white and brown meat separated
2 large diver-caught king scallops, shell and corals removed
selection of sea aster, sea kale & purslane, blanched and kept warm
